stories.description: The Super Admin updates the details of an existing supplier to ensure the information is current and accurate.
stories.expected_outcome:
Success toast message appears: 'Data berhasil diperbarui'

VALIDATION: Assert: toast message contains 'berhasil'. Assert: modal closes after save

steps.target: Step 1: Click 'more_vert' on the supplier row
Step 8: Verify success message and modal closure

stories.user_persona: Super Admin searching for active suppliers
stories.description: The Super Admin filters the supplier list to view only active suppliers and verify the search functionality.
stories.expected_outcome:
Table refreshes and shows only suppliers with status 'Active'

VALIDATION: Assert: table row count changes after search. Assert: supplierStatus filter shows 'Active'

steps.target: Step 3: Verify table updates to show only active suppliers

stories.user_persona: Super Admin adding a new supplier
stories.description: The Super Admin adds a new supplier to the system to expand the supplier database.
stories.expected_outcome:
New supplier appears in the supplier list with correct details

VALIDATION: Assert: new supplier 'Test Name' is listed with correct details

steps.target: Step 7: Verify new supplier is listed

stories.description: The Super Admin toggles the active status of a supplier to manage supplier availability.
stories.expected_outcome:
Supplier status changes and confirmation dialog appears

VALIDATION: Assert: status toggle changes. Assert: confirmation dialog appears

steps.target: Step 3: Verify status change and confirmation

stories.description: The Super Admin resets all search filters to view the complete list of suppliers.
stories.expected_outcome:
All filter fields reset to empty/default state and table shows all suppliers

VALIDATION: Assert: all filters are cleared. Assert: table shows complete supplier list

steps.target: Step 2: Verify all filters are cleared
Step 3: Verify table shows all suppliers
